channel.title: Lolium perenne on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Lolium perenne on funPlantGenes

item.title: LpHUB1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LpHUB1 Gene Name: Bronsyn LE HUB1 Genome: Species: Lolium perenne Functional Descriptions: Overexpression of ubiquitin-like LpHUB1 gene confers drought tolerance in perennial ryegrass.

item.title: LpNOL
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: LpNOL Gene Name: Genome: Species: Lolium perenne Functional Description: The objectives of this study were to characterize the function of LpNOL in regulating leaf senescence and to determine the molecular factors and associated metabolic pathways underlying NOL regulation of leaf senescence in perennial ryegrass.
